data.eml:eml: A new species of cave catfish from Brazil, Trichomycterus rubbioli sp. n., from Serra do Ramalho karstic area, São Francisco River basin, Bahia State (Silurifomes: Trichomycteridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bichuette, Maria Elina, Rizzato, Pedro Pereira (2012): A new species of cave catfish from Brazil, Trichomycterus rubbioli sp. n., from Serra do Ramalho karstic area, São Francisco River basin, Bahia State (Silurifomes: Trichomycteridae). Zootaxa 3480: 48-66, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282362
